measured_by: Percentage of cause allocated to the worker versus the tire (cause-allocation task)
justification: “Participants … allocated the cause of the event between the factors they identified as causal … Using the percentage breakdown informed us about how causal participants perceive each worksite factor they identified.”

measured_by: 9-point Likert scale rating of likelihood that the hypothesis would be proven correct
justification: “Participants used 9-point Likert scales to make their meta-cognitive judgments. They rated the likelihood that their hypothesis would be proven correct.”

measured_by: 9-point Likert scale rating of how objective the participant believed they were
justification: “Participants … rated … the number that best reflected how objective they believe they were in their evaluation of the evidence.”
